headline: Wells Fargo is Bullish on this Real Estate Dividend Stock
summary: Ventas, Inc. (NYSE:VTR) is one of the best dividend stocks in the real estate sector. On November 25, John Kilichowski from Wells Fargo issued a Buy rating on Ventas. The analyst assigned a price target of $88 for the stock. Separately, the company reported its Q3 2025 financials on October 29. Year-to-date at the end […]

headline: How Investors May Respond To Ventas (VTR) Raising Senior Housing Investment Targets After Strong Q3 Results
summary: In the third quarter of 2025, Ventas reported normalized FFO per share of US$0.88, surpassing analyst estimates and increasing 10% year over year; the company also raised its normalized FFO guidance and investment volume target for senior housing to US$2.5 billion. An important insight is that Ventas’ positive performance was anchored by strong same-store cash NOI growth in its senior housing and outpatient medical portfolios, even as triple-net leased properties saw a slight decrease. We'll...

headline: Ventas Announces Pricing of Senior Notes Offering
summary: CHICAGO, December 02, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that its wholly owned subsidiary, Ventas Realty, Limited Partnership ("Ventas Realty"), has priced an underwritten public offering of $500.0 million aggregate principal amount of 5.000% Senior Notes due 2036 (the "Notes") at an issue price equal to 99.510% of the principal amount of the Notes. content.summary: CHICAGO, December 02, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that its wholly owned subsidiary, Ventas Realty, Limited Partnership ("Ventas Realty"), has priced an underwritten public offering of $500.0 million aggregate principal amount of 5.000% Senior Notes due 2036 (the "Notes") at an issue price equal to 99.510% of the principal amount of the Notes.
